TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CanonicalTrackedInputFiles extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class is the filetracking log interpreter for .read. tracking logs in canonical form or those that have been rooted (^) to make them canonical

MemberSignature.Value: public CanonicalTrackedInputFiles (Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] tlogFiles, Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] sourceFiles, Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CanonicalTrackedOutputFiles outputs, bool useMinimalRebuildOptimization, bool maintainCompositeRootingMarkers);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] tlogFiles, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] sourceFiles, class Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CanonicalTrackedOutputFiles outputs, bool useMinimalRebuildOptimization, bool maintainCompositeRootingMarkers) cil managed

Docs.param: The .read. tlog files to interpret
The primary source files to interpret dependencies for
The output files produced by compiling this set of sources
WARNING: Minimal rebuild optimization requires 100% accurate computed outputs to be specified!
True to keep composite rooting markers around (many-to-one case) or false to shred them (one-to-one or one-to-many case)
Docs.summary: Constructor for multiple input source files

The primary source files to interpret dependencies for

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] ComputeSourcesNeedingCompilation() cil managed

Docs.summary: This method computes the sources that need to be compiled based on the output files and the full dependency graph of inputs.
Docs.returns: Array of files that need to be compiled

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] ComputeSourcesNeedingCompilation (bool searchForSubRootsInCompositeRootingMarkers);
.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] ComputeSourcesNeedingCompilation(bool searchForSubRootsInCompositeRootingMarkers) cil managed

Docs.param: If true, search composite rooting markers for subroots.
Docs.summary: This method computes the sources that need to be compiled based on the output files and the full dependency graph of inputs, optionally searching composite rooting markers for subroots that may contain input files.
Docs.returns: Array of files that need to be compiled

.method public hidebysig instance void SaveTlog(class Microsoft.Build.Utilities.DependencyFilter includeInTLog) cil managed

Docs.param: Delegate used to determine whether a particular file should be included in the compacted tlog.
Docs.summary: This method will re-write the tlogs from the current dependency. As the sources are compiled, new entries willbe tracked.
